channel.title: About on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in About on My New Hugo Site

item.title: About stack
item.description:
Welcome

Stack is a simple card-style Hugo theme designed for Bloggers. Here are some of the features:

  • Responsive design
  • Simple and clean layout
  • Support for Markdown and HTML
  • Support for code highlighting
  • Support for math equations
  • Support for tables
  • Support for footnotes
  • Support for image galleries
  • Support for social media links
  • Support for custom menus
  • Support for custom widgets
  • Support for custom CSS
  • Support for custom JavaScript
  • Support for custom analytics
  • Support for custom tracking
  • Support for custom advertising
  • Support for custom sharing
  • Support for custom comments
  • Support for custom search
  • Support for custom pagination
  • Support for custom breadcrumbs

Copyright

This theme is based on the Hugo Clean theme by Huabing Zhao.

Sponsoring

If you like this theme, you can sponsor me to keep it going. Thank you!

赞助

Thanks to

  • Hugo
  • Hugo Clean
  • Hugo Cleanwhite
